Scene:
The Ashikaga Palace
(Ashikaga yakata / 足利館)

Play: The Gion Festival (祇園祭礼信仰記)

Production: May 1971

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Tsukomadayū (竹本津駒大夫)

Takemoto Datejidayū (see also Takemoto Datetayū V) (竹本伊達路大夫)



Shamisen Players:

Nozawa Katsunosuke (野澤勝之輔)

Nozawa Kichibei IX (野澤吉兵衛 (九))
